root.publications: Lewis, M. Paul (ed.). 2009. Ethnologue: Languages of the World, 16 edn. http://www.ethnologue.com/home.asp. (15 February, 2011.)
root.pub-comments: This tree is meant to show Platoid as an additional subgroup in the Niger-Congo family. That is why it is a tree of only subgroups.
